domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock And why play the ‘Nlame’ game? It’s a pointless exercise! As Leadsome pointed out having the target has been a catalyst for driving the testing programme! Never a good idea to have a single number target, much better to have a range. 80k - 100k for instance!
